title: Evolution, Satan's Lie: Evolution VS God
description: Evolution is a obsolete theory or lie! With today's science there is absolutely no evidence for evolution. In this book you will find all of what evolution uses as proof for evolution's to be false. Yet we are still teaching that evolution is true and is scientific contrary to the evidences. Darwin himself said that paleontology would prove that evolution is true but in the last 150 years there has been no fossil evidence to substantiate evolution. Today's science disproves evolution!
author: Terry Hueffed
